DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether Proellex safe effective treatment symptomatic endometriosis .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Evaluate Proellex Treatment Premenopausal Women With Symptomatic Endometriosis
DOC.criteria: Premenopausal woman age 1848 inclusive Endometriosis document laparoscopic surgical assessment within past ten ( 10 ) year Clinical symptom endometriosis least past three ( 3 ) month Endometriosis symptom Must sexually active unless sexually inactive endometriosisrelated dyspareunia Must regular steady menstrual cycle last 24 36 day detectable ovulation baseline period use ovulation monitor kit ( time endometrial biopsy ) Other inclusion criterion may apply Six ( 6 ) month without menstrual period , Prior hysterectomy Prior bilateral oophorectomy Diagnosis osteopenia Present history condition cause nonendometriosisrelated dyspareunia Presence excessive bleeding menorrhagia Abnormal screen endometrial biopsy Other exclusion criterion may apply
